name: ejs-i18n-helper
description: Preview i18n translation values inline in EJS templates. Prefill i18n function calls with values from JSON files. Supports multiple locales.Preferences i18n JSON files from a specified folder.

i18nEjsPreview.i18nFolder.description: Folder containing i18n JSON files (relative to workspace root)

i18nEjsPreview.defaultLocale.description: Default locale to use for previews (e.g., 'en', 'fr')

i18nEjsPreview.functionName.description: i18n function name used in templates
